embeddedItem.name: Key of Inspiration
embeddedItem.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the Meditative Scholars. Used to level up Traces slightly for Erudition characters.
embeddedItem.lore:
It can unlock inspirations hidden deep within the conscience.
To take hold of the key is to grasp at the darting embers of thought that lead to the forward path.

"Eureka!"
